book_name: The 48 Laws of Power by Robert Greene
summary: In this chapter, Robert Greene expresses his heartfelt gratitude to those who contributed to the creation of 'The 48 Laws of Power.' He acknowledges the support and insights of key individuals, including editors, friends, and scholars who influenced his work. Greene pays homage to the historical figures and anecdotes that shaped his understanding of power dynamics.

slides.section_title: A Heartfelt Thanks to Anna Biller
slides.section_body: Robert Greene starts by recognizing Anna Biller for her pivotal role in editing and researching the book.
slides.quote: Anna's invaluable insights shaped the very essence of this work.

slides.section_body: Greene extends his gratitude to Michiel Schwarz for introducing him to the art school Fabrika in Italy.
slides.quote: In the scheming world of Fabrika, the ideas for power came to life.

slides.section_body: Greene acknowledges Henri Le Goubin for sharing myriad Machiavellian anecdotes over the years.
slides.quote: Henri's anecdotes enriched my understanding of Machiavelli's world.

slides.section_body: Les and Sumiko Biller are thanked for their generous access to a library rich in Japanese history.
slides.quote: Every culture's history adds a brushstroke to the canvas of power.

slides.section_body: Elizabeth Yang receives recognition for her guidance on Chinese history.
slides.quote: Understanding history across cultures reveals the universal truths of power.

slides.section_body: Greene expresses gratitude to the UCLA Research Library for its exceptional collections.
slides.quote: A treasure trove of knowledge informed every page of this work.

slides.section_body: The author acknowledges his parents, Laurette and Stanley Green, for their unwavering support.
slides.quote: Family support is the silent strength behind any great work.

slides.section_body: Greene humorously pays tribute to his cat, Boris, who kept him company during long writing sessions.
slides.quote: Even a cat can inspire in the quiet hours of solitude.

slides.section_body: Greene reflects on those who have used power to manipulate him.
slides.quote: Even adversaries become teachers in the game of power.

slides.section_body: Lastly, Greene thanks the publishing team at Penguin for their belief in the project.
slides.quote: Great works are born from the collaboration of dedicated souls.
